metadata.title: CVE-2022-23935 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
lib/Image/ExifTool.pm in ExifTool before 12.38 mishandles a $file =~ /\|$/check, leading to command injection.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-23935` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libimage-exiftool-perl - 12.44+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libimage-exiftool-perl package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '12.44+dfsg-1').
